normalized: 6 days had passed since that.
i had successfully impregnated her with my child during my first insemination.
as if to show off the wicked remodelling of her womb, asagi had reached her last month of pregnancy by the 6th day.
it was all what i wanted.
that asagi.
impregnating that goddess of death, who had looked down on me and wrecked my life, with my sperm, and making her give birth to my kid.
we would be approaching that moment soon.
…tch.
and yet, i wasn't satisfied.
no matter how much i raped her, the distance from asagi wouldn't shrink.
if i only made her body mine, i wouldn't feel satisfied at all.
i wanted to steep all of asagi in my lust.
shit!
a hopeless empty feeling.
that tied into my irritation, and had become the reason for the increase in my nightly drinking.
shit…
i cursed, and my legs stumbled drunkenly forward.
i'm back, asagi!
and so i returned to the room, while breathing breaths that reeked of alcohol from my inarticulate mouth.
it was immediately after that.
…eh?
asagi was standing in the centre of the room.
…asa…gi?
the moment i confirmed that, i was assailed by an illusion that the air of the room had grown cold.
you're asagi… right?
i asked a question that even i thought was ridiculous.
well, i couldn't help but do so.
the asagi who was staring at me right now was absolutely not clad in the obscene air of someone who had been reduced to a prostitute.
on the contrary, she seemed…

name: asagi
normalized: …hmph.
with a short breath, which contained a little hint of contempt, asagi took half a step back.
wha…?!
asagi?!
are you planning to run away?!
due to asagi's behavior,
no, due to her gaze, which utterly despised me, i reflexively gripped the handle of my gun and pulled it out.
however, i only got that far.
ah… eh?
in the middle of that, i realized.
that the stomach of asagi, who was supposed to have received my sperm and gotten pregnant, was back to normal.
her stomach―which should have been swollen, reaching the end of her pregnancy―had deflated like there was nothing there.
no, like she had never been pregnant from the start.
her body boasted exquisite proportions, as if she had never had sex with me in the first place.
…eh?
immediately after, a flash of heat ran along the nape of my neck.
ah… eh?
and right after that, my field of vision tilted.
finally, it began to rotate.
around and around, 2, 3 times.
no, 4.
my world continued spinning.
in the course of that, i saw a headless mannequin…
the fact that it was wearing the same clothes as me bothered me a little.
however, before i reached it, something else entered my field of vision.
the face of a woman who made thoroughly cold-looking eyes.
a… a…
even though i tried to call that woman's name, my voice wouldn't come out.
because a decapitated person couldn't talk anymore.
the moment i realized that…
i fell to the floor, making an awfully messy sound.
at the same time, my consciousness started rapidly becoming dim.
it was being dragged into a gloomy crimson darkness, from which it could never return.
who was that woman?
why was something like this happening to me?
who was i, in the first place?
various questions floated through my murky conscious- ness, then disappeared.
somehow, i managed to remember just one thing.
asagi…
but, was that a name?
i didn't know, anything… anymore…
（asa…gi…）
in the end, unable to even breathe out the word that i had tried to say, my life… vanished into the darkness.
